20101208170549.000|20101208170551.000|CCO|SYMBOLIC BUT EFFECTIVE WAY OF 
20101208170551.000|20101208170553.500|CCO|PUNISHING, POKING A STICK IN THE

20101208170601.000|20101208170602.429|CCO|TOWARDS WIKILEAKS BY NO LONGER

20101208170613.000|20101208170615.000|CCO|SENSE THAT THIS GROUP ANONYMOUS 
20101208170615.000|20101208170617.000|CCO|IS REALLY QUITE WELL-KNOWN IN 
20101208170617.000|20101208170619.000|CCO|THE HACKING COMMUNITY, AND THEY 
20101208170619.000|20101208170621.000|CCO|DO THIS SORT OF THING.
20101208170621.000|20101208170622.667|CCO|THEY DO IT SORT OF 
20101208170622.667|20101208170624.333|CCO|SYSTEMATICALLY TO THE CHURCH OF 
20101208170624.333|20101208170626.000|CCO|SCIENTOLOGY, AND THEY'VE HAD 
20101208170626.000|20101208170627.667|CCO|MANY TARGETS OVER THE YEARS.
20101208170627.667|20101208170629.333|CCO|THERE'S NO REASON FOR THEM TO 
20101208170629.333|20101208170631.000|CCO|SAY OTHERWISE.
20101208170631.000|20101208170633.000|CCO|SO, YES, IT'S WIDELY ACCEPTED 
20101208170633.000|20101208170635.000|CCO|THAT IT'S THEM.

20101208170649.000|20101208170651.000|CCO|WE'RE ON WIKILEAKS' SIDE.
20101208170651.000|20101208170654.333|CCO|>> SO LAY THIS OUT FOR US.
20101208170654.333|20101208170657.667|CCO|ANYONE USING THEIR CREDIT CARD
